text: "Brian Wallows and Peter's Swallows" is the 17th episode of the 3rd season of Family Guy. It was first shown on television on January 7, 2002. In the episode, Brian Griffin must take care for an elderly woman. Brian does not like her, but he learns that she was a great singer. While this happens, an endangered species of birds live in Peter's new beard. "Brian Wallows and Peter's Swallows" was written by Allison Adler. Dan Povenmire is the director of the episode. The people that were guest stars in the episode are A. J. Benza, Gary Cole, Adria Firestone, Melora Hardin, Butch Hartman, Phil LaMarr, Jane Lynch, Nicole Sullivan, Wally Wingert, Lori Alan, and Mike Barker. A song in the episode won an Emmy Award. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:Family Guy episodes Category:2002 television episodes
title: Brian Wallows and Peter's Swallows
